title: Rant!!!
content: Bruh online classes hv been going on for a while and now they said campus opens ok Feb 15th. All cool for that but no clarity on isa 1 or 2, ghatiya management hai bruh. One day before they will tell off that we hv isa or some shit, no clarity or whatsoever. Mkc thak gaya hu bro.

comments.body: Well, in the calendar of events for round 1 peeps (which we got months ago), they *did* technically say that ISA 2 would start from Feb. So in court, we can't battle them, all we can do is vent and cry here lol.

I understand your pain. Mfs won't leave us alone. They want us to suffer till we graduate. Plus I'm in my 6th sem. Kudos to getting belted :')

Hang in there op. We're all in this together ಥ‿ಥ

It's on Feb 15th :(

I hope you got the time table
